commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan create
commands.summary: Create a plan for a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer plan create --id
                                               --name
                                               --offer-id
                                               [--no-wait]
                                               [--subtype]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan create --id MyPlanId --name "My Plan Name" --offer-id MyOfferId
az partnercenter marketplace offer plan create --id MyPlanId --name "My Plan Name" --offer-id MyOfferId --subtype managed-app

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan delete
commands.summary: Delete a plan for a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer plan delete --id
                                               --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan delete --id MyPlanId --offer-id MyOfferId

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan list
commands.summary: List the plans of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan list --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan list --offer-id MyOfferId

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan show
commands.summary: Get the plan of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer plan show --id
                                             --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer plan show --id MyPlanId --offer-id MyOfferId
